mapper.select: select project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, call_id, obj_args_seq, seq, type, array_flag, the_value from lv_invoke_method_call_info where call_id = #{callId}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_method_call_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, array_flag, the_value) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{arrayFlag}, #{theValue})

insert into lv_invoke_method_call_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, array_flag, the_value) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.arrayFlag}, #{entity.theValue})

insert into lv_invoke_method_call_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, array_flag, the_value) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.arrayFlag}, #{entity.theValue})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), array_flag = values(array_flag), the_value = values(the_value)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_method_call_info
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
array_flag = #{arrayFlag},
the_value = #{theValue},
where call_id = #{callId}
